method.name: has_category_mask
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the result has [member category_mask].

method.name: has_confidence_masks
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the result has [member confidence_masks].

members.member: The category mask of the segmentation, each pixel is a 8-bit unsigned integer that represents the class which the pixel in the original image was predicted to belong to.
The list of confidence masks where each pixel is the prediction confidence between [0, 1].
